name: homarr-iframes
description: Homarr Iframes is an add on for the Homarr dashboard that allows embedding external websites and web apps as iframe widgets. It helps users build richer personal dashboards by integrating many self hosted tools in one view.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Embed external websites and web apps directly into Homarr dashboard tiles

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Display multiple self-hosted tools in a single unified dashboard view

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Automatically adjust iframe sizes to fit dashboard layout

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access web interfaces without opening new tabs or windows

features.title: Security Options
features.description: Control iframe sandbox settings and permissions for each embedded service

features.title: Dashboard Enhancement
features.description: Transform Homarr into a comprehensive control center for all your services
